009package Ch13_ColorImages;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
016import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.color.iterate.RandomHueGenerator;
018
019
020/**
021 * ImageJ plugin, creates a tiled image with random colors
022 * obtained by varying hue only.
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 * @see imagingbook.common.color.iterate.RandomHueGenerator
026 */
027public class Random_Hue_Demo implements PlugIn {
028        
029        private static int TileSize = 20;
030        private static int TilesHor = 48;
031        private static int TilesVer = 32;
032        
033        private double Saturation = 0.9;
034        private double Brightness = 0.9;
035        
036        private static long RandomSeed = 0;
037        private static String title = Random_Hue_Demo.class.getSimpleName();
038        
039        @Override
040        public void run(String arg) {
041                
042                if (!runDialog()) {
043                        return;
044                }
045                
046                int width = TileSize * TilesHor;
047                int height = TileSize * TilesVer;
048                
049                ColorProcessor cp = new ColorProcessor(width, height);
050                RandomHueGenerator rhg = new RandomHueGenerator(RandomSeed);
051                rhg.setSaturation(Saturation);
052                rhg.setBrightness(Brightness);
053                
054                for (int i = 0; i < TilesHor; i++) {
055                        for (int j = 0; j < TilesVer; j++) {
056                                Color c = rhg.next();
057                                cp.setColor(c);
058                                cp.fillRect(i * TileSize, j * TileSize, TileSize, TileSize);
059                        }
060                }
061                
062                new ImagePlus(title, cp).show();
063        }
064        
065        private boolean runDialog() {
066                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
067                gd.addMessage("Creates a tiled color image with random hues.");
068                gd.addNumericField("Tile size", TileSize, 0);
069                gd.addNumericField("Tiles horizontal", TilesHor, 0);
070                gd.addNumericField("Tiles vertical", TilesVer, 0);
071                gd.addNumericField("Saturation 0..1 (S)", Saturation, 2);
072                gd.addNumericField("Brightness 0..1 (V)", Brightness, 2);
073                gd.addNumericField("Random seed (0=none)", RandomSeed, 0);
074                gd.addStringField("Image title", title, 12);
075                
076                gd.showDialog();
077                if (gd.wasCanceled())
078                        return false;
079                
080                TileSize = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
081                TilesHor = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
082                TilesVer = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
083                Saturation = gd.getNextNumber();
084                Brightness = gd.getNextNumber();
085                RandomSeed = (long) gd.getNextNumber();
086                title = gd.getNextString();
087                return true;
088        }
089}
